info.message: You can swim or workout during your period.

info.text: Tampons do not take away your virginity.
info.message: Your viginity is determined by whether you have had penetrative sex.
Discharge from the vagina is not toxic.

info.text: You can have sex during your period.
info.message: You can have sex during your period. You can fall pregnant during this time too, so be careful.

info.text: You cannot enter the kitchen during your period.
info.message: You can do many things on your period. With the right sanitary products you can build your own kitchen on your period.

info.text: You can get pregnant during your period.
info.message: You can get pregnant during your period, so be careful.

info.text: Your menstrual cramps disappear when you get married.
info.message: Your menstrual cramps do not disappear when you get married.

info.text: Taking birth control pills can cause irregular periods
info.message: Taking birth control can cause irregular periods.

info.text: If you have unprotected sex during your period you can contract HIV/AIDS
info.message: If you have unprotected sex during your period you can contract HIV/AIDS from an infected person.
Menstruation is a normal and healthy cycle. It is needed for our species to reproduce.

info.text: There is no such thing as a normal period. It is different for every women.
info.message: Although there is no such thing as a normal period. A healthy period may require medical intervention. Seek out your medical professional if you have any period problems.
